topic_title:
Amazon EC2 Container Service Service
      LoadBalancers

variables.description: The name of a container to use with the load balancer.
variables.name: ContainerName

variables.description: The port number on the container to direct load balancer traffic to. Your                   container instances must allow ingress traffic on this port.
variables.name: ContainerPort

variables.description: The name of the load balancer to associated with the Amazon ECS service.
variables.name: LoadBalancerName
